#summary Setting up SVN server on Ubuntu Linux

Described [http://www.subversionary.org/howto/setting-up-a-subversion-server-on-ubuntu-gutsy-gibbon-server here]. My comments are:

 * You can use jstar to edit /etc/passwd and /etc/group instead of vipw and vigr:

`sudo -i
apt-get install joe
jstar /etc/passwd
jstar /etc/group`
